item.title: Finding and Replacing Text in a Word Document Using python-docx
item.description: Tutorial on how to find and replace text in a word document using the python-docx package

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: releasetrackr releasetrackr is a way to subscribe to release notifications on GitHub repos. The notifications go directly to your email. It's built using Go and MongoDB. reactStartPage3 reactStartPage is my own personal start-page and is built using React & Materialize CSS scsscompiler scsscompiler is a plugin for Sublime Text which will compile the currently selected SCSS to CSS. It currently has over 29K installs. mgmt mgmt was written during ReactRiot 2017.

item.title: About
item.description: I'm a software developer living in the USA. My current skillset includes: Go PHP VB.Net JavaScript Python Laravel Flask

item.title: Participating in ReactRiot 2017
item.description: See how I and a team of 3 others built a React app for the 48 hour hackathon ReactRiot

item.title: Create a Webform Handler in Drupal 8
item.description: Follow this easy tutorial on how to build a Webform form handler in Drupal 8
